column2: Fix an error when the HEAD is detached

column3: The error occurred when there is no current branch (e.g. a commit is checked out).
Fixed by checking if the parameter is null before passing it to getBranchPresentation() method.
Thanks for the contribution! But this has already been fixed in 0e2571c
Unfortunately, it seems that this repository is not being updated for 3 days, that's why you didn't see the commit. We'll check ASAP.
